tables.title: Group Segmental Performance
rows: - Gain arising from disposal of highway concessions
- Gain arising from disposal of highway concessions

markdown:
| Category | 2023 | 2022 | 2021 | 2020 | 2019 |
|-----------|------|------|------|------|------|
| **GROUP REVENUE** | | | | | |
| Engineering and Construction | 6,190 | 3,452 | 3,287 | 4,789 | 4,138 |
| Property Development | 2,838 | 2,728 | 1,295 | 1,521 | 2,547 |
| Expressway | 50 | 255 | 434 | 495 | 496 |
| Revenue | 9,078 | 6,435 | 5,016 | 6,805 | 7,181 |
| **GROUP PROFIT BEFORE TAX** | | | | | |
| Engineering and Construction | 618 | 490 | 341 | 239 | 283 |
| Property Development | 440 | 408 | 216 | 173 | 314 |
| Expressway | 60 | 118 | 229 | 326 | 304 |
| Core Profit Before Tax | 1,118 | 1,016 | 786 | 738 | 901 |
| Add/(Less): One-off items | 1,111 | - | - | - | - |
| - Gain arising from disposal of highway concessions | - | - | - | (148) | - |
| - Impairment of IBS assets | - | - | - | - | - |
| Profit before tax | 2,229 | 1,016 | 786 | 590 | 901 |
| **GROUP NET PROFIT** | | | | | |
| Engineering and Construction | 500 | 416 | 253 | 173 | 237 |
| Property Development | 315 | 310 | 172 | 127 | 259 |
| Expressway | 45 | 80 | 163 | 225 | 204 |
| Core Net Profit | 860 | 806 | 588 | 525 | 700 |
| Add/(Less): One-off items | 978 | - | - | - | - |
| - Gain arising from disposal of highway concessions | - | - | - | (148) | - |
| - Impairment of IBS assets | - | - | - | - | - |
| Net Profit | 1,838 | 806 | 588 | 377 | 700 |
summary: The table provides a detailed breakdown of group segmental performance from 2019 to 2023, including revenue, profit before tax, and net profit across different segments such as Engineering and Construction, Property Development, and Expressway.
